page.title: 12ATTITUDES
page.content: The area is a prosperous part of Merseyside with very good housing and a semi-rural environment. Most people had moved into the area dsuring the last 3O years and appreciated the improvements in their life style in comparison to city life in Liverpool They enjoy being close to the countryside and within easy reach of the amenities of the city. Their complaints were mostly concerned with damage to property and surroundings, although vandalism is not a major problem. The majority of people believe that more local amenities were needed and complain about lack of public transport. A very high proportion of residents have a car but older people feel public transport is inadequate.
